GeneDef.label: gene extractor
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can extract a copy of all of another person's genes through a somewhat gross-looking proboscis organ and integrate them as a new xenogerm. The target's genetic material will then regrow very slowly. If they extract while the target's genes are regrowing, the target will die.

AbilityDef.label: Extract genes
AbilityDef.description: Extract a willing subject's genes using a special proboscis organ, creating a xenogerm and applying it to this person. If the target's genes are currently regrowing, they will die in the process. If this person also has the Incorporate gene, this ability can also target a corpse, destroying it in the process.\n\nOnce extracted, the new xenogerm will overwrite this person's xenogenes. Germline genes will be unaffected.

GeneDef.label: profuse genes
GeneDef.description: Carriers have enhanced genetic replication and transcription mechanisms, producing extra copies of their genes as backups and rapidly expressing new genes. This improves longevity and cancer resistance, and reduces the side effects of being subjected to genetic manipulation.
